articles.content: The great Steve Waugh has become the latest former cricketer to question India's team selection for the World Test Championship final against Australia, saying they have "picked the wrong side" by no… [+1922 chars]

articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: Amid Asia Cup Row, ICC Might Move Champions Trophy 2025 Out Of Pakistan, Shift It To West Indies, USA : Report - Times Now
articles.description: While the T20 World Cup might be moved to England, Ireland, and Scotland, the USA and West Indies could host the 2025 ICC Champions Trophy as compensation. Meanwhile, Pakistan will be given monetary compensation.
